name: getrandomuser
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool random_chunk_api.
Tool description: A simple random picker for names, movies, TV shows, quotes, and numbers. A simple JSON object, user object, and array generator.
API description: Fetches random user data such as name, e-mail, etc., from the specified API.

count.description: The number of user records to retrieve. Defaults to -2 if not specified.
